definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]

sentences.english: A check box is toggled by pressing the spacebar.
sentences.chinese: 一个复选框可通过单击空档键进行切换。

sentences.english: Also, make sure you check the box to create a main method.
sentences.chinese: 另外，确保勾选了关于创建主方法的复选框。

sentences.english: There is a checkbox next to each product plug-in data collector.
sentences.chinese: 每个产品插件数据收集器旁边有一个对应的复选框。

sentences.english: Uncheck Use a layout or master page.
sentences.chinese: 去掉“母板页布局”复选框。

sentences.english: You can suppress this message by selecting the check box in the dialog.
sentences.chinese: 通过选中对话框中的复选框，您可以取消此消息。

sentences.english: Down the left-hand side you'll see a set of check boxes.
sentences.chinese: 沿着左手边你会看到一个复选框集。

sentences.english: Check the box next to an effect to enable it.
sentences.chinese: 在某一特效旁边的复选框上打勾以启用它。

sentences.english: The other checkboxes specify behavior to be followed after the extraction.
sentences.chinese: 其他复选框指定在提取完成之后应该执行的行为。

sentences.english: By clearing this check box, you limit the number of templates available.
sentences.chinese: 通过清除此复选框，可以限制可用模板的数量。

sentences.english: To revoke these authorities, you could uncheck the box beside each authority.
sentences.chinese: 要撤消这些权限，可以不选中权限旁边的复选框。

sentences.english: Uncheck boxes Leaving only one box checked and click okay.
sentences.chinese: 取消勾选框只留下一个复选框，然后点击好。

sentences.english: To set a check in every subitem , you check the checkbox in the column header.
sentences.chinese: 要设置在每一个分项目检查时，检查的列标题复选框。

sentences.english: Let's add a checkbox that toggles a message on and off.
sentences.chinese: 让我们添加一个复选框用于开关消息。

sentences.english: You will see two checkboxes on this page. It is the second one that is relevant here
sentences.chinese: 在此页面上将看到两个复选框。

sentences.english: You will notice that in this case, the check box specifying multi-valued data is selected.
sentences.chinese: 您会注意到指定多值数据的复选框被选中了。
